channel.title: Simple problem 317
channel.description: umm i have added a shop the npc wise old man to my home at edge it all works fine it opens up an says donator shop thats what i want but for some reason i cant get it to only open for donators only i tried adding every type of donator only commands inside client that i could but nothin seemed to work can someone post a snipet of a code or something please

item.title: Simple problem 317
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:6, topic:388238”][quote author=MrMud link=topic=484063.msg3547179#msg3547179 date=1301254908]

if(NPCID == 710 && donator == true){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 5;
} else {
sendMessage("you're not a donator");
}

[/quote]
No…

if(NPCID == 710 && donator == 1){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; } else { sM("You aren't a Donator and therefore cannot use this shop."); }[/quote]
Exactly what he said.
clawz fury is a pro

Read full topic

item.title: Simple problem 317
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“MrMud, post:5, topic:388238”] if(NPCID == 710 && donator == true){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; } else { sendMessage("you're not a donator"); } [/quote]
No…

if(NPCID == 710 && donator == 1){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; } else { sM("You aren't a Donator and therefore cannot use this shop."); }

item.title: Simple problem 317
item.dc:creator: @l_skinner_l l skinner l
item.description:
@l_skinner_l wrote:

[quote=“MrMud, post:2, topic:388238”]something like this?

if(donator == true) { wanneShop(1); } else { sendMessage("you're not a donator'); }[/quote]

nothing on that had worked umm mine are like this can someone give me a pointer on what im doing wrong?

if(NPCID == 545){ openTan(); } if(NPCID == 710){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 5; } if(NPCID == 2253){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; } if(NPCID == 2536){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; } if(NPCID == 994){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 46; }
